blocks.name: wich
blocks.content: Extend wff notation to include the propery of a wff ` ph ` that the setvar variables ` x ` and ` y ` are interchangeable. Read this notation as " ` x ` and ` y ` are interchangeable in wff ` ph ` ".
blocks.origin: prop wff wich(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) { [s0 <> s1]w0 }

blocks.name: diff.wich.s
diff.wich.c
diff.wich.w
df-ich
blocks.content: Define the propery of a wff ` ph ` that the setvar variables ` x ` and ` y ` are interchangeable. For an alternate definition using implicit substitution and a temporary setvar variable see ~ ichcircshi . Another, equivalent definition using two temporary setvar variables is provided in ~ dfich2 . (Contributed by AV, 29-Jul-2023.)

blocks.name: ichid
blocks.content: A setvar variable is always interchangeable with itself. (Contributed by AV, 29-Jul-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm ichid(setvar s0, wff w0) {
  |- wich(s0, s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbir(wich(s0, s0, w0), wal(s0, wal(s0, wb(wsb(s0, hs0, wsb(s0, s0, wsb(hs0, s0, w0))), w0))))
  gen2(s0, s0, wb(wsb(s0, hs0, wsb(s0, s0, wsb(hs0, s0, w0))), w0))
  bitri(wsb(s0, hs0, wsb(s0, s0, wsb(hs0, s0, w0))), w0, wsb(s0, hs0, wsb(hs0, s0, w0)))
  sbbii(s0, hs0, wsb(s0, s0, wsb(hs0, s0, w0)), wsb(hs0, s0, w0))
  sbid(s0, wsb(hs0, s0, w0))
  sbid2v(s0, hs0, w0)
  df-ich(s0, s0, hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ichid(setvar s0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ [s0 <> s0]w0
} = {
  mpbir([s0 <> s0]w0, ∀(s0, ∀(s0,([s0 / hs0][s0 / s0][hs0 / s0]w0 ↔ w0))))
  gen2(s0, s0, ([s0 / hs0][s0 / s0][hs0 / s0]w0 ↔ w0))
  bitri([s0 / hs0][s0 / s0][hs0 / s0]w0, w0, [s0 / hs0][hs0 / s0]w0)
  sbbii(s0, hs0, [s0 / s0][hs0 / s0]w0, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  sbid(s0, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  sbid2v(s0, hs0, w0)
  df-ich(s0, s0, hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ichcircshi
blocks.content: The setvar variables are interchangeable if they can be circularily shifted using a third setvar variable, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by AV, 29-Jul-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm ichcircshi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wich(s0, s1, w0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wb(w0, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wb(w2, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w2)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  mpbir(wich(s0, s1, w0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s0, wsb(s2, s1, w0))), w0))))
  gen2(s0, s1, wb(wsb(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s0, wsb(s2, s1, w0))), w0))
  3bitri(wsb(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s0, wsb(s2, s1, w0))), w0, wsb(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s0, w2)), wsb(s0, s2, w1))
  2sbbii(s0, s2, s1, s0, wsb(s2, s1, w0), w2)
  sbievw(s2, s1, w0, w2)
  equcoms(s1, s2, wb(w0, w2))
  bicomd(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s1)), w0, w2)
  sbbii(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s0, w2), w1)
  sbievw(s1, s0, w2, w1)
  equcoms(s0, s1, wb(w2, w1))
  bicomd(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w2, w1)
  sbievw(s0, s2, w1, w0)
  equcoms(s2, s0, wb(w1, w0))
  bicomd(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), w1, w0)
  df-ich(s0, s1, s2, w0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ichcircshi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ [s0 <> s1]w0
  ⊣ (s0 = s2 →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ (s1 = s0 →(w1 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s2 = s1 →(w2 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w2)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  mpbir([s0 <> s1]w0, ∀(s0, ∀(s1,([s0 / s2][s1 / s0][s2 / s1]w0 ↔ w0))))
  gen2(s0, s1, ([s0 / s2][s1 / s0][s2 / s1]w0 ↔ w0))
  3bitri([s0 / s2][s1 / s0][s2 / s1]w0, w0, [s0 / s2][s1 / s0]w2, [s0 / s2]w1)
  2sbbii(s0, s2, s1, s0, [s2 / s1]w0, w2)
  sbievw(s2, s1, w0, w2)
  equcoms(s1, s2, (w0 ↔ w2))
  bicomd(s2 = s1, w0, w2)
  sbbii(s0, s2, [s1 / s0]w2, w1)
  sbievw(s1, s0, w2, w1)
  equcoms(s0, s1, (w2 ↔ w1))
  bicomd(s1 = s0, w2, w1)
  sbievw(s0, s2, w1, w0)
  equcoms(s2, s0, (w1 ↔ w0))
  bicomd(s0 = s2, w1, w0)
  df-ich(s0, s1, s2, w0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: dfich2ai
blocks.content: The definition ~ df-ich of the propery of a wff ` ph ` that the setvar variables ` x ` and ` y ` are interchangeable implies the alternate definition ~ dfich2 . (Contributed by AV, 6-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfich2ai(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s0, wsb(s2, s1, w0))), w0))), wb(wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s4, s1, w0)), wsb(s4, s0, wsb(s3, s1, w0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
  -| diffsw(s4, w0)
} = {
  sylbi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s0, wsb(s2, s1, w0))), w0))), wb(wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s4, s1, w0)), wsb(s4, s0, wsb(s3, s1, w0))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s1, s3, wsb(s0, s4, wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s4, s1, w0)))), w0))))
  2albii(s0, s1, wb(wsb(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s0, wsb(s2, s1, w0))), w0), wb(wsb(s1, s3, wsb(s0, s4, wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s4, s1, w0)))), w0))
  bibi1i(wsb(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s0, wsb(s2, s1, w0))), w0, wsb(s1, s3, wsb(s0, s4, wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s4, s1, w0)))))
  bicomi(wsb(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s0, wsb(s2, s1, w0))), wsb(s1, s3, wsb(s0, s4, wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s4, s1, w0)))))
  sbco4(s1, s3, s0, s4, s2, w0)
  sylbi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s1, s3, wsb(s0, s4, wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s4, s1, w0)))), w0))), wb(wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s4, s1, w0)), wsb(s4, s0, wsb(s3, s1, w0))), wal(s0, wal(s3, wb(wsb(s0, s4, wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s4, s1, w0))), wsb(s3, s1, w0)))))
  albii(s0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s1, s3, wsb(s0, s4, wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s4, s1, w0)))), w0)), wal(s3, wb(wsb(s0, s4, wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s4, s1, w0))), wsb(s3, s1, w0))))
  sbbib(s1, s3, wsb(s0, s4, wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s4, s1, w0))), w0)
  nfsb(s1, s0, s4, wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s4, s1, w0)))
  nfsb(s1, s3, s0, wsb(s4, s1, w0))
  nfs1v(s1, s4, w0)
  nfv(s3, w0)
  sylbi(wal(s0, wal(s3, wb(wsb(s0, s4, wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s4, s1, w0))), wsb(s3, s1, w0)))), wb(wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s4, s1, w0)), wsb(s4, s0, wsb(s3, s1, w0))), wal(s3, wal(s4, wb(wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s4, s1, w0)), wsb(s4, s0, wsb(s3, s1, w0))))))
  bitri(wal(s0, wal(s3, wb(wsb(s0, s4, wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s4, s1, w0))), wsb(s3, s1, w0)))), wal(s3, wal(s4, wb(wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s4, s1, w0)), wsb(s4, s0, wsb(s3, s1, w0))))), wal(s3, wal(s0, wb(wsb(s0, s4, wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s4, s1, w0))), wsb(s3, s1, w0)))))
  alcom(s0, s3, wb(wsb(s0, s4, wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s4, s1, w0))), wsb(s3, s1, w0)))
  albii(s3, wal(s0, wb(wsb(s0, s4, wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s4, s1, w0))), wsb(s3, s1, w0))), wal(s4, wb(wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s4, s1, w0)), wsb(s4, s0, wsb(s3, s1, w0)))))
  sbbib(s0, s4, wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s4, s1, w0)), wsb(s3, s1, w0))
  nfs1v(s0, s3, wsb(s4, s1, w0))
  nfv(s4, wsb(s3, s1, w0))
  2sp(s3, s4, wb(wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s4, s1, w0)), wsb(s4, s0, wsb(s3, s1, w0))))
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wsb.s(s4, s3, s1, w0)
  diffss.ex(s4, s3)
  diffss.ex(s4, s1)
}

blocks.name: dfich2bi
blocks.content: The alternate definition ~ dfich2 of the propery of a wff ` ph ` that the setvar variables ` x ` and ` y ` are interchangeable implies the definition ~ df-ich (see also ~ wl-ich ). (Contributed by AV, 6-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfich2bi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s3, w0)), wsb(s1, s2, wsb(s0, s3, w0))))), wb(wsb(s2, s4, wsb(s3, s2, wsb(s4, s3, w0))), w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s4, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s3, w0)), wsb(s1, s2, wsb(s0, s3, w0))))), wb(wsb(s2, s4, wsb(s3, s2, wsb(s4, s3, w0))), w0)), diffss(s0, s4))
  a1ii(wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s3, w0)), wsb(s1, s2, wsb(s0, s3, w0))))), wb(wsb(s2, s4, wsb(s3, s2, wsb(s4, s3, w0))), w0)), diffss(s1, s4))
  3bitr3g(wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s3, w0)), wsb(s1, s2, wsb(s0, s3, w0))))), wsb(s2, s4, wsb(s3, s2, wsb(s4, s3, w0))), w0, wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s2, s1, wsb(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s3, w0)))), wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s0, s3, wsb(s2, s1, wsb(s1, s2, w0)))))
  sbbid(s3, s0, wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s3, w0)), wsb(s1, s2, wsb(s0, s3, w0))))), wsb(s2, s1, wsb(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s3, w0))), wsb(s0, s3, wsb(s2, s1, wsb(s1, s2, w0))))
  nfa1(s0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s3, w0)), wsb(s1, s2, wsb(s0, s3, w0)))))
  syl6bb(wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s3, w0)), wsb(s1, s2, wsb(s0, s3, w0))))), wsb(s2, s1, wsb(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s3, w0))), wsb(s0, s3, wsb(s2, s1, wsb(s1, s2, w0))), wsb(s2, s1, wsb(s0, s3, wsb(s1, s2, w0))))
  sbbid(s2, s1, wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s3, w0)), wsb(s1, s2, wsb(s0, s3, w0))))), wsb(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s3, w0)), wsb(s0, s3, wsb(s1, s2, w0)))
  nfa2(s1, s0, wb(wsb(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s3, w0)), wsb(s1, s2, wsb(s0, s3, w0))))
  syl6bb(wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s3, w0)), wsb(s1, s2, wsb(s0, s3, w0))))), wsb(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s3, w0)), wsb(s0, s3, wsb(s1, s2, w0)), wsb(s1, s2, wsb(s0, s3, w0)))
  2sp(s0, s1, wb(wsb(s0, s2, wsb(s1, s3, w0)), wsb(s1, s2, wsb(s0, s3, w0))))
  sbcom2(s1, s2, s0, s3, w0)
  sbcom2(s2, s1, s0, s3, wsb(s1, s2, w0))
  sbco4(s3, s0, s2, s1, s4, w0)
  bitri(wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s0, s3, wsb(s2, s1, wsb(s1, s2, w0)))), w0, wsb(s2, s1, wsb(s1, s2, w0)))
  sbid2v(s3, s0, wsb(s2, s1, wsb(s1, s2, w0)))
  sbid2v(s2, s1, w0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wsb.s(s0, s2, s1, wsb(s1, s2, w0))
  diff.wsb.s(s0, s1, s2, w0)
}

blocks.name: dfich2
blocks.content: Alternate definition of the propery of a wff ` ph ` that the setvar variables ` x ` and ` y ` are interchangeable. (Contributed by AV, 6-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfich2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wich(s0, s1, w0), wal(s2, wal(s3, wb(wsb(s2, s0, wsb(s3, s1, w0)), wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s2, s1, w0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
} = {
  bitri(wich(s0, s1, w0), wal(s2, wal(s3, wb(wsb(s2, s0, wsb(s3, s1, w0)), wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s2, s1, w0))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s0, hs0, wsb(s1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))), w0))))
  df-ich(s0, s1, hs0, w0)
  impbii(wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s0, hs0, wsb(s1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))), w0))), wal(s2, wal(s3, wb(wsb(s2, s0, wsb(s3, s1, w0)), wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s2, s1, w0))))))
  alrimi(s2, wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s0, hs0, wsb(s1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))), w0))), wal(s3, wb(wsb(s2, s0, wsb(s3, s1, w0)), wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s2, s1, w0)))))
  nfv(s2, wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s0, hs0, wsb(s1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))), w0))))
  alrimi(s3, wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s0, hs0, wsb(s1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))), w0))), wb(wsb(s2, s0, wsb(s3, s1, w0)), wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s2, s1, w0))))
  nfv(s3, wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s0, hs0, wsb(s1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))), w0))))
  dfich2ai(s0, s1, hs0, s2, s3, w0)
  alrimi(s0, wal(s2, wal(s3, wb(wsb(s2, s0, wsb(s3, s1, w0)), wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s2, s1, w0))))), wal(s1, wb(wsb(s0, hs0, wsb(s1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))), w0)))
  nfal(s0, s2, wal(s3, wb(wsb(s2, s0, wsb(s3, s1, w0)), wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s2, s1, w0)))))
  nfal(s0, s3, wb(wsb(s2, s0, wsb(s3, s1, w0)), wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s2, s1, w0))))
  nfbi(s0, wsb(s2, s0, wsb(s3, s1, w0)), wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s2, s1, w0)))
  nfs1v(s0, s2, wsb(s3, s1, w0))
  nfs1v(s0, s3, wsb(s2, s1, w0))
  alrimi(s1, wal(s2, wal(s3, wb(wsb(s2, s0, wsb(s3, s1, w0)), wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s2, s1, w0))))), wb(wsb(s0, hs0, wsb(s1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))), w0))
  nfal(s1, s2, wal(s3, wb(wsb(s2, s0, wsb(s3, s1, w0)), wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s2, s1, w0)))))
  nfal(s1, s3, wb(wsb(s2, s0, wsb(s3, s1, w0)), wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s2, s1, w0))))
  nfbi(s1, wsb(s2, s0, wsb(s3, s1, w0)), wsb(s3, s0, wsb(s2, s1, w0)))
  nfsb(s1, s2, s0, wsb(s3, s1, w0))
  nfs1v(s1, s3, w0)
  nfsb(s1, s3, s0, wsb(s2, s1, w0))
  nfs1v(s1, s2, w0)
  dfich2bi(s2, s3, s0, s1, hs0, w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wal.s(s2, s0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s0, hs0, wsb(s1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))), w0)))
  diff.wal.s(s2, s1, wb(wsb(s0, hs0, wsb(s1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))), w0))
  diff.wb.s(s2, wsb(s0, hs0, wsb(s1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))), w0)
  diff.wsb.s(s2, s0, hs0, wsb(s1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0)))
  diff.wsb.s(s2, s1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))
  diff.wsb.s(s2, hs0, s1, w0)
  diff.wal.s(s3, s0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s0, hs0, wsb(s1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, w0))), w0)))

blocks.name: icheqid
blocks.content: In an equality for the same setvar variable, the setvar variable is interchangeable by itself. Special case of ~ ichid and ~ icheq without distinct variables restriction. (Contributed by AV, 29-Jul-2023.)

blocks.name: icheq
blocks.content: In an equality of setvar variables, the setvar variables are interchangeable. (Contributed by AV, 29-Jul-2023.)

thm icheq(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- wich(s0, s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  mpbir(wich(s0, s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wb(wsb(s0, hs0, wsb(s1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  gen2(s0, s1, wb(wsb(s0, hs0, wsb(s1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  3bitri(wsb(s0, hs0, wsb(s1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wsb(s0, hs0, wsb(s1, s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wsb(s0, hs0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))
  2sbbii(s0, hs0, s1, s0, wsb(hs0, s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  equsb3r(hs0, s1, s0)
  sbbii(s0, hs0, wsb(s1, s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  equsb3(s1, s0, hs0)
  bitri(wsb(s0, hs0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  equsb3r(s0, hs0, s1)
  equcom(s1, s0)
  df-ich(s0, s1, hs0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
}

thm icheq(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  ⊢ [s0 <> s1]s0 = s1
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  mpbir([s0 <> s1]s0 = s1, ∀(s0, ∀(s1,([s0 / hs0][s1 / s0][hs0 / s1]s0 = s1 ↔ s0 = s1))))
  gen2(s0, s1, ([s0 / hs0][s1 / s0][hs0 / s1]s0 = s1 ↔ s0 = s1))

blocks.name: ichan
blocks.content: If two setvar variables are interchangeable in two wffs, then they are interchangeable in the conjunction of these two wffs. Notice that the reverse implication is not necessarily true. Corresponding theorems will hold for other commutative operations, too. (Contributed by AV, 31-Jul-2023.)

thm ichan(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wa(wich(s0, s1, w0), wich(s0, s1, w1)), wich(s0, s1, wa(w0, w1)))

} = {

thm ichexmpl1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2) {
  ⊢ [s0 <> s1]∃(s0, ∃(s1, ∃(s2,(s0 = s1 ∧ s0 ≠ s2 ∧ s1 ≠ s2))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
} = {
